attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: Idk it was glitchy and supported something I don’t believe in and that’s on pirod.🎈

attributes.title: Wrong app
attributes.review: I thought Cheetos puffs released an app but instead it was Trump. I was here for puff not politics. Trumps not a vibe so I have to put a one star ✨💫☁️

attributes.title: 0 star app
attributes.review: This app is awful. It supports that campaign of a racist, rapist, and misogynist. I wish I could give it 0 stars.

attributes.title: Never buy this app
attributes.review: They couldn’t keep covid in China so they decided to focus on the other epidemic: teenagers dancing.

attributes.title: I ALMOST DIED
attributes.review: i wanted to support our orange cheeto puff president when i opened the app KNIVES flew through the screen. i am lucky to be alive

attributes.title: Terrible (Sad)
attributes.review: So when i used the app my grandma died cause a thing was so scary it gave my grandma a heartattack

attributes.title: Just bad

attributes.title: Horrible👏👏
attributes.review: It's trash just like trump✨🦧I almost died just looking at it👁 just seeing his name makes me wanna vomit🤮

attributes.title: terrible app. wouldn’t even load
attributes.review: the app stores your personal info and tracks your location without permission! the design is very grainy and overall you shouldn’t download it.

attributes.title: Bad Vibes From This App
attributes.review:
Perry!
He's a semi-aquatic, egg-laying mammal of action!
(Dooby dooby doo-bah, dooby dooby doo-bah)
He's a furry little flatfoot
Who'll never flinch from a fray-ee-ay-ee-ay!
He's got more than just mad skill
He's got a beaver tail and a bill
And the women swoon whenever they hear him say
He's Perry, Perry the Platypus!
Perry! (I said you can call him Agent P!)
Agent P.!
